liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for participating

ignoreCaseSensitivity.label: Ignore Case Sensitivity
ignoreCaseSensitivity.tooltip: True if you want the word case sensitivity to be ignored when giving an answer

newWordOnAnswer.label: Switch Words Fast
newWordOnAnswer.tooltip: True if you want it show a new word 10 seconds after someone writes the current word instead of waiting for the remaining cycle time

minWordInterval.label: Min interval in minutes
minWordInterval.tooltip: Minimum interval in minutes before switching the word

maxWordInterval.label: Max interval in minutes
maxWordInterval.tooltip: Maximum interval in minutes before switching the word

OpenWordsFile.label: Open Words File
OpenWordsFile.tooltip: Opens 'words.txt' that contains all words seperated by new line.

minReward.label: Min reward
minReward.tooltip: Minimum ammount the user wins for writing the word first

maxReward.label: Max reward
maxReward.tooltip: Maximum ammount the user wins for writing the word first

responseAnnouncement.label: Word announcement message
responseAnnouncement.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a new word is announced
 $word = The word
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $currency = Name of Currency

responseWon.label: User wins message
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user writes the word first
 $word = The word
 $user = Username
 $reward = Winning reward
 $currency = Name of Currency
